You will also receive a set of tools that will allow you to continue in Leadership development well after this course ends.

objectives_summary: To become a great leader very quickly.
How to ensure others know clearly what is expected of them.
A proven technique for objective setting aligned to organisational strategy.

items.title: Expert Series Vol 2: How to Model Experts and Top Performers
items.headline: Learn how to deconstruct and replicate the skills of your favorite role models.
objectives_summary: Deconstruct the skills of experts and top performers
Know how to find the different labels used to describe the same skills to improve research
Understand the values and beliefs that shape their model's decisions and mindset

items.title: Motivation Psychology Crash-Course for Business Leaders
items.headline: Everything you need to know about Motivation Psychology to become a better Business Leader, Professional, & Manager
objectives_summary: You learn what motivation exactly is and how this influences our behavior.

You will see and hear the core concepts of motivation & behavior loops, learn more about the difference between emotions & feelings, and master the most important motivation theories everyone should know about when designing things for-, or working with people.

Introduction to the SIMPSIS-framework, which is developed to help business professionals apply motivation psychology in their daily job to built better products & services, communication campaigns, or motivate teams more effectively.

items.title: Building Trust in Business as a Catalyst for Performance
items.headline: Using trust to move teams toward common purpose.
objectives_summary: Students will learn that creating conditions of trust and safety will bring out the very best in the people they lead.  They will gain a deep understanding of trust and how it activates inner drive which boosts performance and success.  They will learn exactly what principles drive and grow trust so they may move from a leader with a title, to a leader with loyal partners who follow them toward one common purpose.

items.title: Leading with Clarity in New Jobs -Leadership Skills & Tools
items.headline: A Career Transition Leadership Course that you need while moving to New Jobs / Roles / Assignments
objectives_summary: Develop a leadership style to think and act with clarity
Provide clarity of purpose, plan and responsibility to teams as a leader
Apply tools and techniques to take consistent leadership decisions

items.title: Authentic Leadership: Actionable Practices and Examples
items.headline: Leverage Your True Self to Improve Trust, Honest Relationships and Happiness at Work
objectives_summary: Understand why authentic leadership is important in today’s organizations and is therefore an effective style of leadership
Gain self-awareness by observe your own emotions, values, attitudes and behaviors neutrally without judging
Recognize patterns of authentic and inauthentic behavior in yourself and others and become aware of their effect
